casebody.data:
BROADBAND iTV, INC., petitioner,
v.
HAWAIIAN TELCOM, INC., et al. No. 16-1241. Supreme Court of the United States May 22, 2017.

Motion of U.S. Inventor, Inc., et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Motion of AliphCom, dba Jawbone for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Federal Circuit denied.
